title: Cosmic Cookies

details.label: Completed Size
details.info: 7.0 x 7.0 inches or 17.8 x 17.8 cm on 14 count aida

story: The young astronaut-to-be crafted a delectable universe of gingerbread wonders, where cookie spaceships soared past sugar-dusted planets and frosted stars twinkled with holiday magic.
